Definition.WordDefinition: make over v 1: use again in altered form; "retread an old plot" [syn: {rework}, {retread}] 2: make new; "She is remaking her image" [syn: {remake}, {refashion}, {redo}]

makeover n 1: an overall beauty treatment (involving a person's hair style and cosmetics and clothing) intended to change or improve a person's appearance 2: a complete reconstruction and renovation of something; "the blighted neighborhood underwent a total makeover"
